name: Silo
unsettling_description: Stores dead organisms to feed your livestock.
original_description: Allows you to cut and store grass for feed.

name: Mill
unsettling_description: Crushes things into fine powder. Be careful not to lose any fingers.
original_description: Allows you to create flour from wheat and sugar from beets.

name: Earth Obelisk
original_description: Warps you to the mountains.

name: Water Obelisk
original_description: Warps you to the beach.

name: Desert Obelisk
original_description: Warps you to the desert.

name: Junimo Hut
unsettling_description: An inconspicuous form of magical creature slavery.
original_description: Junimos will harvest crops around the hut for you.

name: Gold Clock
unsettling_description: Fundamentally alters the flow of space-time on your farm. Debris and fences become suspended in time.
original_description: Prevents debris from appearing on your farm. Keeps fences from decaying.

name: Stable
original_description: Allows you to keep and ride a horse. Horse included.

name: Well
original_description: Provides a place for you to refill your watering can.

name: Shipping Bin
original_description: Throw items inside to sell them overnight.

name: Coop
original_description: Houses 4 coop-dwelling animals.

name: Big Coop
original_description: Houses 8 coop-dwelling animals. Comes with an incubator. Unlocks ducks.

name: Deluxe Coop
original_description: Houses 12 coop-dwelling animals. Comes with an auto-feed system. Unlocks rabbits.

name: Barn
original_description: Houses 4 barn-dwelling animals.

name: Big Barn
original_description: Houses 8 barn-dwelling animals. Allows animals to give birth. Unlocks goats.

name: Deluxe Barn
original_description: Houses 12 barn-dwelling animals. Comes with an auto-feed system. Unlocks sheep and pigs.

name: Slime Hutch
original_description: Raise up to 20 slimes. Fill water troughs and slimes will create slime balls.

name: Shed
original_description: An empty building. Fill it with whatever you like! The interior can be decorated.

name: Big Shed
original_description: Doubles the size of the shed. The interior can be decorated.

name: Cabin
original_description: A home for a friend! Subsidized by the town agricultural fund.

name: Cabin
original_description: A home for a friend! Subsidized by the town agricultural fund.

name: Cabin
original_description: A home for a friend! Subsidized by the town agricultural fund.

name: Greenhouse
original_description: A place to grow crops from any season, year round!

name: Mine Elevator
original_description: Quickly travel between any mine elevators you construct. You can only build one per mine level.

name: Fish Pond
unsettling_description: Toss your fish into a bottomless hole and hope they keep breeding down there.
original_description: Raise fish and harvest their produce. Fish multiply over time.
